sentences.en: A realistic depiction of inanimate objects, esp. flowers, fruit, or domestic items.
sentences.cn: 以写实的手法描绘无生命的物体, 比如花 、 水果 、 家什等.

sentences.en: A rock is an inanimate object.
A stone is an inanimate object.
sentences.cn: 石头是一种无生命的物体.

sentences.en: As a rule, the locative postposition only modifies inanimate nouns.
sentences.cn: 按规则, 方位后置词只能修饰无生命的名词.

sentences.en: Dwarven engineers are capable of fixing all machines , and inanimate objects.
sentences.cn: 矮人工程师能够修理各种器械, 解决各类问题.

sentences.en: He inflicted his anger on inanimate things.
sentences.cn: 他把怒气发泄在无生命的事物上.

sentences.en: He made no clear distinction between animate and inanimate things.
sentences.cn: 他对有生的和无生的东西缺乏明确的辨别.

sentences.en: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
sentences.cn: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

sentences.en: He wondered if inanimate objects might have a mental existence.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑是否非生物也可能具有思想意识.

sentences.en: I was not inattentive to inanimate nature, nor unmindful of the past.
sentences.cn: 对无生命的自然我并非不关心,对过去我也并非不留意.

sentences.en: It cannot be replaced by an inanimate object, or a few drinks.
sentences.cn: 爱无法用物体来替代, 或藉酒精来抚慰.

sentences.en: The physical sciences ( physics, chemistry, and astronomy ) deal with material, inanimate systems.
sentences.cn: 自然科学 ( 物理学 、 化学和天文学 ) 的研究对角是物质, 即无生命系统.这篇论文论及机器人的机体操作.

sentences.en: The queues often consisted of one part of people to two parts of inanimate objects.
sentences.cn: 队里常常是三分之一的人,三分之二的物品.

sentences.en: The voice of the so - called inanimate!
sentences.cn: 啊,这些无生命的东西却有多么动听的声音!

sentences.en: Thus the inanimate pop music zone feels the new elegance and artistry.
sentences.cn: 死气沉沉的乐坛,因而萌生了新的风雅.

trans.tran_cn: 无生命的，无生气的， 无精打采的， 单调的
